text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Allohu Rasulaş imon ovardaed, cun şumoro gūjand, dar maçlisho çoj vase' kuned, pas çoj vase' kuned, to Alloh dar dunjovu oxirat ʙaroi şumo vase' kunad. Va cun gūjand, ki ʙarxezed, ʙarxezed. Alloh onhoero, ki imon ovardaand va kasonero, ki axli ilm meʙoşand ʙa daraçahoi ʙalandi savoʙ va martaʙahoi rizvon ʙardorad va Alloh ta'olo ʙa korhoe, ki mekuned, ogoh ast. Az Ū cize maxfī namemonad va muvofiqi on şumoro çazo medihad
